TypeSignature.Value: public delegate TOutput Converter<in TInput,out TOutput>(TInput input);
.class public auto ansi sealed Converter`2<- TInput, + TOutput> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Converter(Of In TInput, Out TOutput)(input As TInput) As TOutput
generic <typename TInput, typename TOutput> public delegate TOutput Converter(TInput input);

span.span: The type of object that is to be converted.

typeparam.name: TOutput
typeparam.span: 要将输入对象转换到的类型。

span.span: The type the input object is to be converted to.

summary.span: 表示将对象从一种类型转换为另一种类型的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that converts an object from one type to another type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该类的方法 和 类的方法使用此委托将集合的每个元素从一种类型转换为另一种类型。 This delegate is used by the method of the class and the method of the class to convert each element of the collection from one type to another. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示了委托， 其中包含类的方法，第二个示例演示了具有泛型类的方法的委托。The first demonstrates the delegate with the method of the class, and the second demonstrates the delegate with the method of the generic class. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例定义了一个名`PointFToPoint`为的方法 ，该方法将结构转换为结构。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 然后，该示例创建一个结构数组， `Converter`创建委托（`Converter(Of PointF, Point)`在 Visual Basic 中）以表示`PointFToPoint`方法，并将委托传递给方法。The example then creates an array of structures, creates a `Converter` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法将输入列表的每个元素传递`PointFToPoint`给方法，并将转换后的元素放入新的结构列表。 The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 将显示这两个列表。Both lists are displayed. [!code-cpp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例定义了一个名`PointFToPoint`为的方法 ，该方法将结构转换为结构。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 然后，该示例创建了一个结构，创建`Converter\`一个用于`Converter(Of PointF, Point)`表示`PointFToPoint`方法的委托（在 Visual Basic 中），并将委托传递给方法。The example then creates a of structures, creates a `Converter\` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法将输入列表的每个元素传递`PointFToPoint`给方法，并将转换后的元素放入新的结构列表。 The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 将显示这两个列表。Both lists are displayed. [!code-cpp[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb#1)]
